pages.text: $(li)The Tiger is a big feline that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/bamboo_jungle)Bamboo Jungle$(/l). It naturally wary of outsiders and will attack if approached.$(br)$(li)By feeding it with meat, you can obtain the Tiger's Blessing.$(br)$(li)This effect allows to you approach a Tiger without being mauled for a few minutes.
They can be bred by giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/acacia_blossom)Acacia Blossom$(/l).
